description:
Shinpei Ajiro returns to Hitogashima for the first time in two years after hearing the news of the death of his childhood friend, Ushio Kofune. Shinpei`s best friend, Sou Hishigata, reveals that someone could have killed her. In Hitogashima, there is a legend concerning those who see their exact "shadow" ending up dead. Mio reveals that she saw Ushio`s shadow while she was still alive.
Source: Disney+
